SELECT CODPARC FROM TGFFIN WHERE NUFIN = :NUCHAVE
SELECT DTNEG FROM TGFFIN WHERE NUFIN = :NUCHAVE

simple-value.expression: Select Distinct (NUACERTO) acerto, TO_DATE(DHALTER) DTALTER , PAR.CODPARC , PAR.NOMEPARC From TGFFRE FRE, TGFFIN FIN, TGFPAR PAR Where (FRE.TIPACERTO Is Null Or FRE.TIPACERTO = 'F') And FRE.NUFIN = FIN.NUFIN And FIN.CODPARC = PAR.CODPARC And FRE.NUACERTO = :NuAcerto Order By 1 Desc
simple-value.value-expression: Numero do Acerto: $ACERTO Data do Acerto: $DTALTER Parceiro: $NOMEPARC

grid.title: Lancamentos de Origem
grid.expression: Select TABELA as TABELA, TIPO AS TIPO, NROUNICO, NUACORDO AS NUACORDO, CODPARC AS CODPARC, NOMEPARC AS NOMEPARC, DTNEG AS DTNEG, VALOR AS VALOR From ( /*Adiantamentos de frete*/ Select 'TGFFIN' AS TABELA,'Adiantamentos de frete' As tipo, fin.nufin As nrounico, fin.NUCOMPENS As nuacordo, fin.CODPARC, par.nomeparc, fin.dtneg, fin.vlrdesdob*-1 As valor From VGFFIN FIN, TGFPAR PAR Where FIN.CODPARC = PAR.CODPARC And FIN.RECDESP = 1 And NUFIN In (Select NUFIN From TGFFRE Where NUACERTO = :NuAcerto And (TIPACERTO Is Null Or TIPACERTO = 'F')) And (721 = 0 Or FIN.CODTIPOPER <> 721) Union All /*Abastecimentos*/ Select 'TGFFIN','Abastecimentos', fin.nufin, fin.NUCOMPENS, fin.CODPARC, par.nomeparc, fin.dtneg, fin.vlrdesdob*-1 From VGFFIN FIN, TGFPAR PAR Where FIN.CODPARC = PAR.CODPARC And FIN.RECDESP = 1 And FIN.NUFIN In (Select NUFIN From TGFFRE Where NUACERTO = :NuAcerto And (TIPACERTO Is Null Or TIPACERTO = 'F')) And FIN.CODTIPOPER = 721 Union All /*Frete por OC*/ Select 'TGFCAB', 'Fretes Contratados', CAB.NUNOTA, fre.nuacerto, ORD.CODPARCTRANSP, PAR.NOMEPARC, ORD.DTINIC, Sum(CAB.VLRFRETE) From TGFORD ORD, TGFPAR PAR, TGFVEI VEI, TGFCAB CAB, TGFTOP TPO, tgffre fre Where ORD.ORDEMCARGA > 0 And ORD.SITUACAO = 'F' And ORD.CODPARCTRANSP = PAR.CODPARC And ORD.CODVEICULO = VEI.CODVEICULO And VEI.PROPRIO = 'N' And ORD.CODEMP = (Select Case When CODEMPOC Is Null Then CODEMP Else CODEMPOC End From TGFEMP Where CODEMP = CAB.CODEMP) And CAB.ORDEMCARGA = ORD.ORDEMCARGA And CAB.CODTIPOPER = TPO.CODTIPOPER And CAB.DHTIPOPER = TPO.DHALTER And CAB.STATUSNOTA = 'L' And CAB.TIPMOV <> 'Q' And TPO.CODMODDOC Not In (8, 57) And FRE.NUNOTA = CAB.NUNOTA And FRE.NUACERTO = :NuAcerto And (FRE.TIPACERTO Is Null Or FRE.TIPACERTO = 'F') Group By CAB.NUNOTA, fre.nuacerto, ORD.DTINIC, ORD.CODPARCTRANSP, PAR.NOMEPARC Union All Select 'TGFCAB', 'Fretes Pautados', cab.nunota,fre.nuacerto, CAB.CODPARCTRANSP, PAR.NOMEPARC, CAB.DTNEG, CAB.VLRNOTA*-1 From TGFCAB CAB, TGFTOP TPO, TGFPAR PAR, TGFVEI VEI, TGFPAR CLI, TSICID CID, tgffre fre Where CAB.STATUSNOTA = 'L' And CAB.CODPARCTRANSP = PAR.CODPARC And CAB.CODVEICULO = VEI.CODVEICULO And VEI.PROPRIO = 'N' And CAB.CODTIPOPER = TPO.CODTIPOPER And CAB.DHTIPOPER = TPO.DHALTER And TPO.CODMODDOC In (8, 57) And CAB.CODPARC = CLI.CODPARC And CLI.CODCID = CID.CODCID And FRE.NUNOTA = CAB.NUNOTA And (FRE.TIPACERTO Is Null Or FRE.TIPACERTO = 'F') And FRE.NUACERTO = :NuAcerto) Order By tipo

grid.title: Adiantamentos Pendentes Vencidos
grid.expression: select nufin, numnota, dtneg, dtvenc, historico, vlrdesdob from tgffin f1 where codparc = :CODPARC and dhbaixa is null and recdesp = 1 and dtvenc < :DTNEG and codnat in (9050100, 9053200) and vlrdesdob <> 0

SELECT distinct numnota, dtneg, top.descroper, nat.descrnat, dtvenc , vlrdesdob FROM TGFFIN fin inner join tgftop top on fin.codtipoper = top.codtipoper inner join tgfnat nat on fin.codnat = nat.codnat WHERE NUFIN = :NROUNICO
